## Warning: This feature is only for Apache servers!
##
## To enable .htpasswd protection, you must rename this file to ".htpasswd" by removing the ".txt" file type from the end.
## You must also uncomment the corresponding section in your ".htaccess" file to correctly point to this file.
##
## To generate the MD5 password you can use http://www.htaccesstools.com/htpasswd-generator/
## To add multiple users, just insert another line with the next username and generated password pair.

# username:password
